'''''The Mural Veil''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to find and clean all 4 murals in {{Location|Chenyu Vale}}.

Three of them are found in the {{Quest|Chenyu's Blessings of Sunken Jade}}, while the fourth is found after completing the {{Achievement|A Ruined Tale}}.
